p: Eligibility will be assessed by treating surgeons or medical oncologists, and all eligible women will receive written information. Women who meet the inclusion criteria will be provided with further information about the study and written informed consent will be obtained by research staff. Based on the experience gained from on-going studies and previous relevant studies within the research group, an inclusion rate of 35% to 40% can be expected. The study was initiated in December 2018 and with the expected inclusion rate; the last participants will complete the intervention during the second half of 2021.
